mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.order_no AS "orderNo", a.goods_id AS "goods.id", c.name AS "goods.name", c.image AS "goods.image", a.spec_ids AS "specIds", a.num AS "num", a.price AS "price", order_flag AS "orderFlag", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN s_order ck ON a.order_no=ck.id LEFT JOIN s_goods c ON a.goods_id=c.id LEFT JOIN s_spec cc ON a.spec_ids=cc.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO s_shop( id, order_no, goods_id, spec_ids, num, price, order_flag, remarks, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{orderNo}, #{goods.id}, #{specIds}, #{num}, #{price}, #{orderFlag}, #{remarks}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE s_shop SET order_no = #{orderNo}, goods_id = #{goods.id}, spec_ids = #{specIds}, num = #{num}, price = #{price}, order_flag = #{orderFlag}, remarks = #{remarks}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
